title: The Eurovision Song Contest!
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 752 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 930L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     T and W
description: The Eurovision Song Contest is Europe's largest and most spectacular song competition. Originally created to unite European nations after World War II, this annual tradition continues to grow in both popularity and pizzazz. The Eurovision Song Contest! introduces students to this entertaining event with a detailed look at its history and some of its more outrageous performances. The book can also be used to teach students how to discern the author's point of view and to effectively summarize. The book and lesson are also available for levels T and W.
